text.*:
MRT 2
Launched 1978
Owned by Macedonian Radio-Television
Picture format 16:9 (576i, SDTV)
Country Macedonia
Broadcast area Macedonia
Headquarters Skopje, Macedonia
Formerly called TV Skopje 2 (1978-1991)
MTV 2 (1991-2012)
Sister channel(s) MRT 1
MRT 1 HD
MRT 3
MRT Sobraniski Kanal
MRT Sat
Website www.mrt.com.mk
Availability
Terrestrial
Analog Usually Channel 002
Digital Channel 002
Boom TV Channel 002
Satellite
Total TV Channel 002
Tring Maks Channel 002
Cable
Blizoo Channel 002
Telekabel Channel 002
Available on most cable operators Check local operators for availability
IPTV
Max TV Channel 021
Streaming media
MRT Play Watch Live (MKD) Only

MRT 2 is a Macedonian television channel owned and operated by Macedonian Radio-Television.

  • www.mrt.com.mk
